channel.title: Machosrealm Dedicated Server - 718/742
channel.description:
Welcome To MachosRealm
You ask yourself, why should I join MachosRealm? What are the benefits? What features do they have? The answer is quite simple.
Over the past few years, I have gone from server to server, game to game, playing the same thing, so I ask myself, why isn't there a unique server unlike anyone else's server? This question boggled in my mind for a while until I realized what my answer was. The answer was to make my own server, MachosRealm.
MachosRealm is a server created and maintained by me, MachoNachos. Over the past few years, I have been in many staff positions on a variety or servers, which eventually died due to lack of players, which was created by the minimal effort from said server's owner, the limited amount of uniqueness, and the minimal amount of creativity and originality. These staff positions gave me knowledge that is helping me now to maintain and support MachosRealm. MachosRealm has many features that most servers dont own. Besides In-game content, we have many other features, both forum and just plainly overall features including our staff team, who monitors the server, and our advertising team. Both teams do an amazing job and maybe, you can join them one day.
A list of features regarding MachosRealm are listed below:D
-A terrific VPS!! -Almost always online! (only time not online is if I am doing updates, which is when I will tell people to log off) -Custom Home unlike any other! -100% bosses, over 15 of them!!! -Helpful community -Friendly staff. (Me being a staff member of many servers, I have the best knowledge on the staff job and I choose who is best for it) -No weekend updates unless necessary! (this is for them Friday and Saturday night gamers :D ( You're welcome) -Many updates that improve the game :D -No lag whatsoever! ( I would know, my friend has a dinosaur for a computer and he plays with 100% no lag) -Active owner ( I am almost always online, if not in school, so ask me if you need anything) :D -Great donation benefits ( Thanks for thinking about donating :D We have great benefits and packages to get ahead of other players) -Astonishing combat! -Bank tabs for great organization of your epic bank! -All Nex Amor! (Torva, Pernix, Virtus) -Sound affects! -Many Awesome emotes! -Perfect Skilling and combat! -100% minigames! (Barrows, Duel Arena, Zombies, Fight Caves, Fight Kiln, Clan Wars, Castle Wars, Dominion Tower, and much more! -Excellent combat and special attacks! -Working auras and flaming skull heads and katanas! -Awesome Shops for everything you need! -All Chaotic Weapons, godswords, spirit shields, korasi sword, and many more powerful items!
The forums are a great place to make friends but in-game is even better. Make sure to pay attention to the forums and in-game so you can learn about recent updates. If you need anything I am happy to help. Either PM me on forums or go to our contact board and send me a message where I will get back to you as quick as possible.There is much more content than listed above! Log in to find out everything we have to offer. We are a server unlike anything else. Start Playing Today!
Thank you for joining MachosRealm. [img]http://puu.sh/2RpLt.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2RpYg.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2Rq4d.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/2Rqag.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@jamietomlin wrote:

EDIT: By the looks of the pictures you’ve posted it looks like rune-evo leeched, my guess could be wrong though.

item.title: Machosrealm Dedicated Server - 718/742
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

A lot of words for an advertisement. Advertisements are made to gain peoples attention with pictures, videos, and words, not just words. I’d advise you to add pictures and use less words.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Machosrealm742 wrote:

Welcome To MachosRealm

You ask yourself, why should I join MachosRealm? What are the benefits? What features do they have? The answer is quite simple.

    Over the past few years, I have gone from server to server, game to game, playing the same thing, so I ask myself, why isn't there a unique server unlike anyone else's server? This question boggled in my mind for a while until I realized what my answer was. The answer was to make my own server, MachosRealm.

    MachosRealm is a server created and maintained by me, MachoNachos. Over the past few years, I have been in many staff positions on a variety or servers, which eventually died due to lack of players, which was created by the minimal effort from said server's owner, the limited amount of uniqueness, and the minimal amount of creativity and originality. -Almost always online! (only time not online is if I am doing updates, which is when I will tell people to log off)

-Active owner ( I am almost always online, if not in school, so ask me if you need anything)

-Bank tabs for great organization of your epic bank!

-Many Awesome emotes!
-Perfect Skilling and combat!
-100% minigames! (Barrows, Duel Arena, Zombies, Fight Caves, Fight Kiln, Clan Wars, Castle Wars, Dominion Tower, and much more!
-Excellent combat and special attacks!
-Working auras and flaming skull heads and katanas!
-Awesome Shops for everything you need!

The forums are a great place to make friends but in-game is even better. Make sure to pay attention to the forums and in-game so you can learn about recent updates. If you need anything I am happy to help. Either PM me on forums or go to our contact board and send me a message where I will get back to you as quick as possible.There is much more content than listed above! Log in to find out everything we have to offer. We are a server unlike anything else. Start Playing Today!

                                                                          Thank you for joining MachosRealm.
